alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 7:41PM CDT until May 06 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CLAY...NORTHWESTERN NUCKOLLS...NORTHEASTERN WEBSTER AND SOUTHERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Holstein, or 16 miles southwest of Hastings, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Roseland around 745 PM CDT. Blue Hill and Ayr around 755 PM CDT. Glenvil around 805 PM CDT. Lawrence around 810 PM CDT. Fairfield and Deweese around 815 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
